item.title: Chimera: Improving Generalist Model with Domain-Specific Experts
item.description: Chimera boosts large multimodal models’ performance on specialized tasks by cleverly integrating domain-specific expert models, achieving state-of-the-art results on multiple benchmarks.

item.title: VLSBench: Unveiling Visual Leakage in Multimodal Safety
item.description: VLSBench exposes visual leakage in MLLM safety benchmarks, creating a new, leak-free benchmark to evaluate true multimodal safety.
